scripts.dev: npm run build:backend && npm run start:db && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:local: npm run build:backend && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run build:backend && npm run start:db
scripts.clean: npm run stop:db && rm -rf backend/dist backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix backend && npm run lint:fix --prefix frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --prefix backend && npm run type-check --prefix frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix backend && npm run test --prefix frontend
scripts.test:watch: npm run test:watch --prefix backend && npm run test:watch --prefix frontend
